summary: Does it bore you too go out hunting for grand level soul gems? Do you prices and rarity of the soul gems  make them hard to obtain? Then this is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a Barrel Ol' Goods to the entrance of Riverwood. Inside that barrel are 100 black soul gems (grand). Each soul gem have and increased value so in the event you don't need them all you can sell them for a heavfty sum.Â
author: Haloplayercantdie
